H0.text: The Isis is the upper reach of which British river. Thames

H1.text: The Isis is the upper reach of which British river. Severn

H2.text: The Isis is the upper reach of which British river. Avon

H3.text: The Isis is the upper reach of which British river. Temze

A4.text: The Thames through Oxford is sometimes called the Isis

A5.text: Some historians suggest the name Isis is nothing more than a truncation of Tamesis, the Latin name for the Thames
